title: Brownmen
description: I have developed an application using Node.js and MongoDB as the backend. I have built an admin panel from scratch to manage the application's data.

title: OMNIPEXEL
description: I built an image search web page from scratch using pixel APIs, incorporating an infinite scroll feature for a more seamless user experience.

title: NOWCAST
description: I developed an application called NewApp that retrieves categories and news from APIs and updates them on a daily basis.

title: CHARTEXT
description: I designed a text conversion application that allows users to input their data and convert the cases according to their specific requirements.
